TopicTitle: Is there a trappist-1 mod that's atleast at 1.11.x?

Articles.Content:
I loved the Slippist-1 mod, But it never got updated from 1.7.3 (i think), So is there anyone that revived it or something?

I really want a trappist-1 system in my KSP.

I think galaxies unbound is your best bet. It has a ton of star systems but if I’m not mistaken tarsis-1 is the Trappist-1 analogue. You can only play with that star system if you disable the others in a simple config file (like a settings menu, info is in the installation instructions
